title: Who we are
description: The Campina Grande Convention Bureau is an organization that connects the tourism trade, public sector, and private initiative, with the goal of attracting and promoting events in the city.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Promote Campina Grande as a destination for events and business.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To be a national reference in event and business tourism.

values.title: Values
values.description: Transparency, collaboration, and commitment to local development.
